Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 56th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2015, off Gary Zoll (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/2015, off George Coletti (STL)...
Traded from Philadelphia to Cincinnati on 2/17/2016 (Going to CIN: 3B Edward Clinard. Going to PHI: DH Asa Kelemen, RF Donald Lamberth, 3B Walter Womac)...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $710,000 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,307,143 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,307,143 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/12/2019 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Colorado on 6/24/2019...
Traded from Cincinnati to Philadelphia on 7/30/2019 (Going to PHI: 3B Edward Clinard, P Jose Mejia. Going to CIN: P Benjamin Berg)...
Signed as a free agent by Brooklyn on 2/4/2020 to a 5-year deal worth $10,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2020, hitting .533 with 2 HR, 13 RBI...
Was claimed off waivers by Cincinnati on 7/31/2021.
Traded from Cincinnati to Detroit on 2/3/2022 (Going to DET: 3B Edward Clinard, 3B Cedrick Fernandez, P Deangelo Montejano, CF Andrew Ruggles, P Thurman Brawley. Going to CIN: P Rodney Schloss)...
Injured on 7/9/2022 with a Torn Hip Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 10/1/2023 with a Fractured Elbow, out for 8 weeks...
Released by Detroit on 7/15/2024...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 7/20/2024 to a 1-year deal worth $540,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Atlanta on 8/20/2024.
Released by Atlanta on 10/5/2024...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 3/2/2025 to a 1-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Cincinnati on 5/2/2025.
